events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect product.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand that you received the wrong item and would like a refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process your refund efficiently?
Here is the order number 45789123 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived instead.
We have reviewed your case and will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. You will receive the amount within 5 business days.
Thank you for addressing this quickly. I appreciate the refund process being started right away.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and your case is now resolved.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
As we did not receive any further issues, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey so we can continue improving our services.
